data.title: Trains Newhaven Harbour to Brighton from €6.93
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Newhaven Harbour to Brighton in 29m. Compare prices, view live journey times & book cheap train tickets for Newhaven Harbour to Brighton.
data.text:
Want to find out more about taking the train from Newhaven Harbour to Brighton? Look no further.

You'll usually find 30 trains per day running between Newhaven Harbour and Brighton, which usually take 32 minutes to complete the 9 miles (14 km) journey. It can take as little as 29 minutes on the fastest services though, if you want to get there as quickly as possible. As soon as you board the train, you'll be able to make yourself comfortable and enjoy the journey as there are direct services available. Southern trains are the main operator of services on this route, so you're likely to travel with them for all or at least part of your journey to Brighton.

Use our Journey Planner at the top of the page to search for cheap ticket prices and we'll show you how much you can save. Tickets from Newhaven Harbour to Brighton start from €6.93 when you book in advance. Travelling Off-Peak or using a Railcard can also help you save.

Keen to book your train tickets to Brighton? No need to wait, start a search with us today! If you want to find out a bit more about the journey first, you can find our train timetable with live train times above, and tips on booking cheap tickets and our FAQs further down the page.
